dt: {bc}an object held to act as a charm to avert evil and bring good fortune
{bc}something producing apparently magical or miraculous effects

et: French {it}talisman{/it} or Spanish {it}talismán{/it} or Italian {it}talismano{/it}; all from Arabic {it}ṭilsam{/it}, from Middle Greek {it}telesma{/it}, from Greek, consecration, from {it}telein{/it} to initiate into the mysteries, complete, from {it}telos{/it} end {ma}{mat|telos|}{/ma}
shortdef: an object held to act as a charm to avert evil and bring good fortune
something producing apparently magical or miraculous effects
